name: v1_recipe
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool recipe_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Search over 200,000 creative recipes. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/recipe.
API description: Get a list of recipes for a given search query. Returns at most 10 results. To access more than the first 10 results, use the offset parameter to offset results in multiple API calls.

query.description: The search query text to find matching recipes.

offset.description: The number of results to offset in order to paginate through the results. Defaults to None.
